short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks spoilers (sports, TV shows, etc.) and other unwanted content from ruining your web browsing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpoilerFree prevents spoilers and other unwanted content from ruining your web browsing experience (and your day). Simply type in the name of the sports team, TV show,   or topic that you don't want to read about, and SpoilerFree will get to work, warning you and blocking content that contains those terms. Never again have your day ruined by ill-timed spoilers.
